changeSet.sql:
-- Build the table of runs which target more than one kind SELECT * INTO #doubleAttRuns FROM ( SELECT attestation_run_id from (SELECT DISTINCT attestation_run_id, child_entity_kind from attestation_instance) a GROUP BY attestation_run_id HAVING count(*) > 1 ) as x
-- Update the existing runs to attested kind logical flow UPDATE attestation_run SET attested_entity_kind = 'LOGICAL_DATA_FLOW' WHERE attested_entity_kind IS NULL AND id in (SELECT * FROM #doubleAttRuns)

changeSet.author: kamransaleem
changeSet.comment: 3273: Attestation run - migrate the existing runs
changeSet.sql:
-- Build the table of runs which target more than one kind CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE IF NOT EXISTS doubleAttRuns AS ( SELECT attestation_run_id from (SELECT DISTINCT attestation_run_id, child_entity_kind from attestation_instance) a GROUP BY attestation_run_id HAVING count(*) > 1 );
-- Update the existing runs to attested kind logical flow UPDATE attestation_run SET attested_entity_kind = 'LOGICAL_DATA_FLOW' WHERE attested_entity_kind IS NULL AND id in (SELECT * FROM doubleAttRuns);
